TextBlock.Text: SENNETTI: On my way over here this morning, I felt certain that I saw shapes flitting about in the fog. Has anybody else observed this phenomenon?

OKALIS: I too have noticed this, friend. They seem to be the same species as the person I made contact with recently. They have been quite bold with me. One was stationed directly outside my window this morning, but ran off as soon as I stirred!
SENNETTI: What should we do? They do not yet appear hostile, but our stalkerâ€™s behavior is very concerning.
AZOLLA: I suspect that they will be the ones to make the first move. Remember, stay with one another, and do not behave aggressively.
AZOLLA: I have noticed this as well Sennetti, I believe that our strange neighbors may be keeping an eye on us.
NESIA: I noticed some shapes in the fog when I stepped out of my abode last night as well.
